channel.title: Trying to .jar my client but its not working? PLEASE READ
channel.description:
ok so i'm following a youtube tutorial on jarring a Project Insanity Client but its not working im using impozzed Client. and this is the tutorial im following http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fpeeK4EFb4I
Basically you make a manifest doctument with [code]Main-Class=GUI[/code]
and run cmd find ur client threw cmd and jar it, but when i type jar this happens. [code]c:\Users\joel\Desktop\Divine-Rubix Client>jar 'jar' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code] Could i get alittle help here? the problem i think it is, is main-class is not gui?
